name: Context
description: A code editor application that allows users to write, compile, and share code seamlessly. Features include version control, user authentication, document sharing, and a compiler supporting multiple programming languages. Built for efficiency and scalability.

name: NBA PER Prediction Model
description: A data mining and machine learning project designed to predict Player Efficiency Ratings (PER) using advanced NBA statistics. Trained on multiple years of data (2014-2024), the model emphasizes predictive accuracy, feature importance analysis, and practical insights for sports analytics.

name: Weather App
description: A responsive weather application designed for desktop and mobile, featuring real-time temperature, hourly forecasts, and visuals that adapt to weather conditions. Desktop layout includes a personalized dashboard with search, saved locations, and daily or weekly forecast views, while mobile users access a simplified real-time panel.

name: Garden By Deka
description: A four-page gardening blog developed for a TikTok creator, showcasing her work and passion for gardening. Designed with consistent theming, responsive layouts, and interactive elements using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript.

name: Digital Manager
description: A Java-based CRUD application for managing employee records. Built with Swing, this lightweight desktop tool allows users to add, update, delete, and search employee data. Ideal for small organizations that need a local management solution.

name: PP-Translate
description: A web application that translates documents from one language to another using an AI-Powered translation model. It allows users to upload documents and translate them into their desired language. It also allows users to save their translations and view them later.

name: Games
description: A modern Snake game developed in Python with Tkinter. A terminal-based C game where players have eight attempts to guess a randomly generated three-digit number. A browser-based Ping Pong game built with HTML, CSS, and JavaScript.

name: Organ
description: A quick-capture saving tool for storing URLs, text/code snippets, documents, images, and more with keyboard shortcuts. Integrates AI to automatically generate summaries and keyword tags, enabling fast retrieval through a dashboard interface.

name: SmartBudget
description: A personal finance project that categorizes transactions to predict future expenses using machine learning. The system ingests raw financial data, cleans and processes it with Pandas, NumPy, and PySpark, and classifies spending into categories such as food, bills, and entertainment. Predictive models built in TensorFlow and Scikit-learn forecast upcoming expenses, while interactive dashboards in Tableau visualize spending trends.

name: Binder
description: A personal media library for managing audio and video content. Users can upload, categorize, and share their curated collections. Will include filtering options and collaborative profile sharing features. Ideal for people that want to access their own digital media in a user-friendly way.

name: Craft
description: An AI-powered interview preparation platform. Simulates realistic interviews with voice-based AI, delivers instant feedback on content quality, tone, and pacing, and provides detailed performance analytics to guide improvement.

name: Panels
description: A local AI-powered virtual assistant designed as a floating desktop overlay. Provides voice and text-based interactions, screen reading, and light system controls such as opening applications or performing quick searches. Built for accessibility and productivity with a minimal, persistent UI.

name: Community Map
description: A mobile-friendly application that connects individuals with essential community resources such as food banks, clinics, shelters, and legal aid. Features a ZIP code-based search, interactive map pins, detailed resource information, and more.

name: [Insert] Learn
description: An interactive course creation and management platform that enables creators to build lessons, quizzes, and daily challenges while providing learners with progress tracking, streaks, and leaderboards. Designed to make online learning engaging, customizable, and scalable.

name: Queue App
description: An appointment scheduling application for clinics and service-based businesses. Features include conflict detection, automated reminders, secure client data handling, and role-based access control. Everything will be managed from a dashboard interface.
